hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: commit
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: A proper commit sha, first 10 characters: git rev-parse HEAD | cut -b -10

info.propertiesContent: GYP_MSVS_VERSION=2013 PYTHON=c:\python27\python.exe NODE_COMMON_PORT=12301 DESTCPU=$DESTCPU ARCH=$ARCH DISTTYPE=$disttype DISTTYPEDIR= DATESTRING=$datestring COMMIT=$commit CUSTOMTAG=rc.$rc SSHCONFIG=\config RELEASE_URLBASE=$release_urlbase

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: export PATH=$(pwd)/smoker/bin:$PATH cd smoker node -v npm -v npm install --prefix=$(pwd) --global --loglevel=error citgm

export PATH=$(pwd)/smoker/bin:$PATH export npm_config_nodedir=$(pwd) export npm_loglevel=error retval=0
cd smoker
citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error lodash@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error underscore@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error request@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error commander@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error express@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error chalk@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error q@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error colors@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error coffee-script@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error through2@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error bluebird@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error moment@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error yeoman-generator@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error glob@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error gulp-util@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error jade@latest || retval=1 # citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error redis@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error socket.io@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error fs-extra@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error body-parser@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error uglify-js@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error handlebars@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error rimraf@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error yosay@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error mime@latest || retval=1 # citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error mongodb@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error graceful-fs@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error bignum@latest || retval=1 citgm --nodedir=$npm_config_nodedir --lookup --verbose error hapi@latest || retval=1
exit $retval
